thread.section_title: Stand Together for Education Reform. Online Petitions.
thread.title: Reunite my family

title: Reunite my family
text:
by: Dominique Taylor target: Families 
My children and I are desperately seeking help to be reunited with the most loving caring hardworking Husband anyone could ever ask for. We are coming up to our 4th year of marriage and it's hard without my support partner, taking care of two beautiful children and working full time is very demanding. I would love to go home and have him there waiting to look after us as he usually did. PLEASE HELP US read petition letter â–¾ 
My Husband was deported from our home at 8pm 31st of March 2016. A ban was put on him for 5 years. He was a law abiding citizen worked full time and was the captain of the local Phoenix league team. He took great pride in everything he did, including taking care of us the best he could, my children and I are desperately seeking any help possible to be reunited as a family. Please will you help by signing this petition
